com.openfeint.api.resource
Class Leaderboard

java.lang.Object
  com.openfeint.internal.resource.Resource
      com.openfeint.api.resource.Leaderboard

public class Leaderboard
extends com.openfeint.internal.resource.Resource

The resource class that represents a Leaderboard in OpenFeint. You use this class to:

  • Get the list of Leaderboards that were created on the Developer Dashboard for this application,
  • Download the list of high Scores for a Leaderboard, or
  • Submit a Score to a Leaderboard.

Nested Class Summary
static class Leaderboard.GetScoresCB
          A callback class you can extend for calling Leaderboard.getScores() and Leaderboard.getFriendScores().

          A callback class you can extend for calling Leaderboard.getUserScore().

          A callback class you can extend for calling Leaderboard.list().

Field Detail

name

public java.lang.String name
The user-visible name of the Leaderboard.

localUserScore

public Score localUserScore
The Score that the local User has posted to this Leaderboard, if any.

descendingSortOrder

public boolean descendingSortOrder
Whether this Leaderboard sorts ascending or descending. If true, then sort order is descending (like basketball); if false, then sort order is ascending (like golf).

allowsWorseScores

public boolean allowsWorseScores
Whether this Leaderboard allows worse scores. If true, then submitting a score will always overwrite the previous score, even if it's not as good as the player's previous score. If false, then only the best score will be kept.

highScores

public java.util.List<Score> highScores
The top of the list of high scores. This field is not filled out in Leaderboards returned by Leaderboard.list(); it is only filled out if you call Leaderboard.getScores().

Constructor Detail

Leaderboard

public Leaderboard(java.lang.String resourceID)
Create a Leaderboard object with the given resource ID. This won't automatically fill the other fields out - see Leaderboard.list() or Leaderboard.getScores() if you want to consult other fields of the Leaderboard.

Parameters:
resourceID - The resource ID of the Leaderboard.

Leaderboard

public Leaderboard()
This constructor is for use by the parser only.

Method Detail

getScores

public void getScores(Leaderboard.GetScoresCB cb)
Call this method to get the top of global list of high Scores for this Leaderboard.

Parameters:
cb - The callback object that will be given the list of Scores.

getFriendScores

public void getFriendScores(Leaderboard.GetScoresCB cb)
Call this method to get the top of friend list of high Scores for this Leaderboard.

Parameters:
cb - The callback object that will be given the list of Scores.

getUserScore

public void getUserScore(User forUser,
                         Leaderboard.GetUserScoreCB cb)
Call this method to get the current Score for the specified User on this Leaderboard. The current Score might be the User's high score for this leaderboard, but if you have checked Allow worse scores for this leaderboard, it might simply be the most recently posted score for this user on this leaderboard.
NOTE: If the User has -not- posted a Score to this Leaderboard, your callback's onSuccess() method will be called with a null Score parameter! onFailure() will only be called if there was a failure communicating with the server.

Parameters:
forUser - the User to get the Score for.
cb - The callback object that will be given the Score.

list

public static void list(Leaderboard.ListCB cb)
Call this method to get a list of Leaderboards that are available to your application. These are the Leaderboards that you've created on the Developer Dashboard.

Parameters:
cb - The callback object that will be given the list of Leaderboards.

getResourceClass

public static com.openfeint.internal.resource.ResourceClass getResourceClass()
This method is used internally by OpenFeint.
